page.title: 06Rainford Local Industry
page.content: Rainford's first major industry was clay pipe making,but coal mining produced much work in the area as well.Now Rainford's industry is on a Hi-tec level,with industries such as service engineering,haulage and agricultural vehicles.In our cross section of industries,we found that most were labour intensive.You must take into account that over half of had been in existance for only two or three years. None of these industries use computers but most of them plan to in the near future.Some of them employ one or two handicapped people and some don't.The industries were established between 1949-84 and employ between three and twenty-nine people. About one to six are women and most of them are planning to or have had expansion.They are all hopeful for the future.
